    • clamp

      public static int clamp(int min, int v, int max)
      limits the value v to the interval from min to max, returning min if v is less than min, max if v is greater than max, and v otherwise
      Parameters:
      min - set a minimal value
      max - set a maximal value
      v - it's the value we are looking
      Returns:
      return the value, if it's in the range
